summary: A detail-oriented and organized Housekeeper/Cook with experience in logistics management, food safety, and customer service. Proven ability to work efficiently in fast-paced environments and ensure high standards of cleanliness and food quality. Seeking to leverage my skills in menu design, food handling, and housekeeping to provide exceptional support to individuals with brain, spinal cord, and medically complex injuries and illnesses.
education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress), Modesto Junior College, Modesto, CA
Culinary Arts Program, Placer County Adult Education

bullets: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium to streamline data collection and reporting workflows, reducing manual administrative time by 40%
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive driver and route data
Developed 'Apache Genie,' a Python-based CLI tool to automate server deployment and diagnostics
Perform comprehensive hardware/software diagnostics and system restorations to ensure business continuity
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service
Leveraged local geographic knowledge to navigate complex delivery windows and solve on-road logistical challenges in real-time
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments
Identified systemic bottlenecks in the manual scheduling process; designed and implemented a custom scheduling system that reduced downtime by 30% and improved fleet utilization
Maintained 99% on-time delivery rate to major retailers (Walmart, Costco) through rigorous planning and driver management
